text: Bwindi may refer to: * Bwindi Impenetrable Forest, a primeval forest located in southwestern Uganda * Bwindi Impenetrable National Park, a park containing much of Bwindi Impenetrable Forest * Bwindi gorilla, a population of mountain gorillas found in Bwindi Impenetrable Forest * The 1999 Bwindi massacre of eight Western tourists to Bwindi Impenetrable National Park by the Army for the Liberation of Rwanda
title: Bwindi
